messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Attention Crew, This is the RD speaking, I'm taking command of the station until such a point that we are assigned a captain. So yeah,  Just wanted you to know.

messages.author: Head of Personnel's Desk
messages.body: Attention crew, we are in need of medical doctors or anything like that, if you wanna apply for the job just come to my office.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Space Station 13 door subroutines. Severity level of 3. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Escape Shuttle Hallway.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Attention SpaceStation 13. An unidentified nanotrasen vessel is docking into your station. Take caution. Centcomm out.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Three Taps. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Attention. Unknown Vessel has docked. Lifesigns: Unknown. Cargo: Unknown. Investagate.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Attention. The unknown vessel is hostile. And has been scanned. Until the threat is dealt with. You may not leave. CentComm out.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: The Threat has been neutralized and the quarentine has been lifted. Evacuation is permitted. Two staff members have been killed.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: DANGER. CENTCOMM OVERRUN..DO NOT DOCK-I REPEAT, DO NOT D-Transmission lost.-
